LightningComponentBundle.description: A component that displays up to 5 buttons with icons, allowing selection of one button at a time. The selected value is returned to the parent and descriptive information is shown on hover.

property.name: buttonsJson
property.label: Buttons JSON
property.description: A JSON string representing the list of buttons, including value, icon, label, and infoText.

property.name: defaultSelected
property.label: Default Selected Button
property.description: The value of the default selected button.

property.name: headerText
property.label: Header Text
property.description: Header text. If no null no header will be displayed.

property.name: selectedValue
property.label: Selected Button Value
property.description: Returns the value of the selected button.
